main event: A spherical object with a tail was sighted in Denver, Colorado on May 27, 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a pea at arm's length., The color of the object shifted from orange to bluish green., The tail was observed initially before appearing to burn out., The sighting lasted for approximately 10 to 15 seconds., The case was evaluated as a meteor sighting due to its characteristics.
sighted object: a round object with a tail, changing color
witness description: a tool and die maker from Denver
